data.description:
Specializations: Particular custom pod racer.

Advanced skill -- requires repulsorlift operatoins of at least 5D.

Pod racers are dangerously fast, difficult to pilot vehicles which combine a typical repulsorlift engine with extremely powerful thruster engines for unbelievable performance. Pod racer operation reflects a character’s ability to successfully fly one of the fastest, and most dangerous vehicles in the galaxy.

Pod racer operation can be used for a vehicle dodge — a “reaction skill” — to avoid enemy fire.
data.label: OD6S.CHAR_SKILLS
